name: Farming Rush
description:
An Overcooked-style Farming Simulator created for the Ludum Dare 52 with the theme of "Harvest".

Controls
  • Move with WSAD/Arrow Keys
  • Mouse to interact with objects (player must be close enough)
  • ESC to pause
Tools
  • Unreal Engine 5.1 (game engine)
  • Blender (3d art)
  • Photoshop (2d art)
  • Audacity (some sound effects + music recording/effects)
  • ZzFX (most sound effects)
